title: Loan Application Portal
description: Customer-facing portal to facilitate digital loan applications and document submission.

userStories.title: Account Authentication & Access
userStories.description: Secure authentication and account management for loan applicants.

tasks.title: User login via FinTrust SSO
tasks.description: Enable customers to log in using FinTrust Bank's Single Sign-On system.
tasks.acceptance_criteria:
["Given I am a registered FinTrust customer
When I navigate to the loan portal login page
Then I am prompted to authenticate via SSO and redirected to my dashboard upon success","[Negative] Given I enter incorrect credentials
When I attempt to log in
Then I see an authentication error message and stay on the login page","[Edge] Given a session times out after inactivity
When I try to access any protected page
Then I am prompted to log in again via SSO"]

userStories.title: Loan Application Submission
userStories.description: Customers can complete and submit loan applications.

tasks.title: Submit personal loan application
tasks.description: As an applicant, I want to complete a personal loan application form so that I can request a loan digitally.
tasks.acceptance_criteria:
["Given I am logged in
When I fill all required fields for personal loan and submit
Then my application is saved and I receive a confirmation notification","[Edge] Given I submit an incomplete form
When I attempt to submit
Then required fields are highlighted and submission is blocked","[Negative] Given I am not authenticated
When I try to submit an application
Then I am redirected to login"]

tasks.title: Upload identity and income documents
tasks.description: As an applicant, I want to upload required documents so that the bank can verify my identity and income.
tasks.acceptance_criteria:
["Given my application requires document uploads
When I select and upload valid files
Then each file is successfully attached to my application","[Edge] Given I upload a file that exceeds size limits
When I attempt to upload
Then I see an error and the file is rejected","[Negative] Given I upload a file with an unsupported format
When I attempt upload
Then I receive a format error and the upload is blocked"]

userStories.title: Application Status Tracking
userStories.description: Enable applicants to view the status and history of their loan applications.

tasks.title: View loan application status
tasks.description: As an applicant, I want to see the real-time status of my loan application so that I can track its progress.
tasks.acceptance_criteria:
["Given I am logged in and have an active loan application
When I go to the Application Status page
Then I see the current status and timeline of my application","[Edge] Given I have no submitted applications
When I visit the Application Status page
Then I see an empty-state card and a prompt to start a new application","[Negative] Given I access the status page without authentication
When I request application status
Then I am redirected to login"]

title: Automated Document Verification
description: Automate the verification of identification and income documents using OCR technology.

userStories.title: OCR Document Processing
userStories.description: Integrate OCR service for extracting data from uploaded documents.

tasks.title: Automatic extraction of data from documents
tasks.description: As a system, I want to extract name, ID number, and income details from uploaded documents using OCR so that verification is automated.
tasks.acceptance_criteria:
["Given a document is uploaded
When OCR processes the document
Then the extracted fields are auto-populated in the application record","[Edge] Given OCR returns low confidence on extracted data
When verification is attempted
Then the applicant is prompted to manually review/correct fields","[Negative] Given OCR service is unavailable
When a document is uploaded
Then manual data entry and verification are triggered"]

userStories.title: Document Verification Results
userStories.description: Show results of automated document verification to reviewers and applicants.

tasks.title: Notify applicant of document verification status
tasks.description: As an applicant, I want to be informed if my documents are verified or need correction so that I can respond promptly.
tasks.acceptance_criteria:
["Given my documents have been processed
When verification is completed
Then I receive a notification with pass/fail result and next steps","[Edge] Given document verification fails
When I view my application
Then I see specific reasons and a prompt to re-upload or correct information"]

title: Credit Check & Scoring Integration
description: Automate credit checks via Credit Bureau API and generate applicant credit score.

userStories.title: Credit Bureau API Integration
userStories.description: Connect to Credit Bureau and process applicant credit information.

tasks.title: Initiate automated credit check
tasks.description: As a system, I want to initiate a credit check for applications so that loan eligibility can be assessed quickly.
tasks.acceptance_criteria:
["Given all required applicant data is present
When I submit an application for credit review
Then the credit bureau API returns a score and report","[Edge] Given the API times out or is unavailable
When a credit check is requested
Then a manual review workflow is initiated and flagged for loan officer","[Negative] Given invalid applicant data
When a credit check is initiated
Then I receive a validation error and the check is not processed"]

userStories.title: Display Credit Score to Loan Officers
userStories.description: Show applicant credit score and details in the management dashboard.

tasks.title: Loan officer views applicant credit score
tasks.description: As a loan officer, I want to see credit score and report directly in the dashboard so that I can inform approval decisions.
tasks.acceptance_criteria:
["Given an application with completed credit check
When I open the applicant file on dashboard
Then credit score and summary report are displayed","[Edge] Given credit score is below the minimum threshold
When I view the report
Then the application is flagged for rejection and annotated"]

title: Approval Workflow Automation
description: Automate the loan approval or rejection workflow for speed and compliance.

userStories.title: Automated Decision Engine
userStories.description: Apply business logic and compliance checks to trigger automated approvals or escalations.

tasks.title: Automatic loan approval/rejection based on criteria
tasks.description: As a system, I want loan applications auto-approved or rejected using set business rules so that outcomes are consistent and timely.
tasks.acceptance_criteria:
["Given an application meets all automated criteria
When it is processed by the engine
Then it is auto-approved and applicant notified","[Edge] Given an application is flagged for manual review due to exceptions
When processing occurs
Then it is routed to a loan officer for review and logged","[Negative] Given a rejected application
When the applicant views their status
Then clear rejection reasons and appeal instructions are shown"]

userStories.title: Compliance Check Integration
userStories.description: Ensure regulatory checks are performed before final approval.

tasks.title: Automated compliance validation
tasks.description: As a system, I want to check loan applications against regulatory rules so that approvals remain compliant.
tasks.acceptance_criteria:
["Given a loan application is ready for approval
When compliance rules are applied
Then approval only proceeds if application is compliant","[Edge] Given a compliance rule is updated
When new applications are processed
Then the system applies the new rule and logs the change"]

title: Internal Loan Management Dashboard
description: Employee-facing dashboard to manage and track loan application workflows.

userStories.title: Loan Application Search & Filters
userStories.description: Enable employees to search and filter loan applications efficiently.

tasks.title: Search loan applications by customer name or ID
tasks.description: As a loan officer, I want to search and filter applications so that I can quickly find relevant cases.
tasks.acceptance_criteria:
["Given multiple applications in system
When I enter a name or ID and submit a search
Then only matching applications are listed","[Edge] Given no search results
When I search for a non-existent name
Then I see 'No applications found' message"]

userStories.title: Application Audit Trail
userStories.description: Track changes and decisions for compliance and transparency.

tasks.title: View application history and actions
tasks.description: As an underwriter, I want to view all changes and approval/rejection events on an application for audit purposes.
tasks.acceptance_criteria:
["Given an existing application
When I open the audit trail tab
Then all actions, timestamps, and user details are displayed","[Negative] Given a user without dashboard permissions
When they attempt to access the audit trail
Then access is denied and an error message shown"]

title: Notifications & Automated Reminders
description: Automated email/SMS updates for applicants and internal stakeholders.

userStories.title: Customer Application Status Updates
userStories.description: Send automated notifications for status changes, reminders, and required actions.

tasks.title: Applicant receives status update notifications
tasks.description: As an applicant, I want to receive email/SMS updates for my loan application status so that I'm informed throughout the process.
tasks.acceptance_criteria:
["Given my application status changes
When the change is processed
Then I receive an email/SMS notification with updated status","[Edge] Given delivery of notification fails
When a status change occurs
Then a retry mechanism is triggered and failure logged"]

userStories.title: Internal Task Reminders
userStories.description: Automated reminders for pending tasks sent to loan officers and underwriters.
userStories.acceptance_criteria:
["Given I have pending applications assigned
When a reminder is due
Then I receive an email/SMS notification of pending tasks","[Edge] Given reminders are sent when no open tasks exist
When the reminder is triggered
Then no notification is sent"]

tasks.title: Employee receives reminder for pending tasks
tasks.description: As a loan officer, I want automated reminders about pending reviews so that I complete them within the SLA.
tasks.acceptance_criteria:
["Given I have pending applications assigned
When a reminder is due
Then I receive an email/SMS notification of pending tasks","[Edge] Given reminders are sent when no open tasks exist
When the reminder is triggered
Then no notification is sent"]

title: Reporting & Analytics
description: Dashboard for monitoring application volume, outcomes, and customer feedback.

userStories.title: Application Volume & Turnaround Reports
userStories.description: View and export statistics on loan volume and processing speed.

tasks.title: Generate loan application processing report
tasks.description: As a manager, I want to view and export reports on the number of applications and average turnaround times so that I can monitor operational efficiency.
tasks.acceptance_criteria:
["Given I access the reporting dashboard
When I select a date range and type
Then I see a report graph and export option","[Edge] Given no data for selected period
When report is generated
Then a 'No data found' notice is shown"]

userStories.title: Customer Satisfaction Tracking
userStories.description: Track post-approval customer satisfaction via survey results.

tasks.title: View aggregated customer satisfaction metrics
tasks.description: As a manager, I want to see trends in customer satisfaction surveys so that I can assess and improve service quality.
tasks.acceptance_criteria:
["Given multiple post-loan surveys submitted
When I view CSAT dashboard
Then metric trends and recent comments are displayed","[Negative] Given insufficient survey data
When metrics are requested
Then a warning is displayed indicating low sample size"]
